title: Riot i cant log HELP!
body: So when i go to login it says Unable to connect to the login queue. Check the server status. if it looks good, follow the guide here. and it does say it all the time Help.

replies.body: Hm, I know PBE was down for maintenance but live regions should be okay.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as it sounds like something is blocking you from reaching our services.  That should help clear things up.

I was having the same problem. The client is being slow. I restarted my machine twice and tried to open league multiple times. 
Wasn't working. Finally after three times of restarting, I was able to log in. Everything feels really clunky at the moment for me though. Not really sure what is happening.
